---
title: "Project or Program Title"
subtitle: "Brief Tagline or Description"
date: today
version: "1.0"

# Key metrics displayed prominently
metrics:
  - label: "Students Served"
    value: "500+"
  - label: "Success Rate"
    value: "94%"
  - label: "Year Established"
    value: "2020"

contact:
  name: "Contact Name"
  title: "Title/Position"
  email: "email@arizona.edu"
  phone: "(520) 621-0000"
  website: "https://infosci.arizona.edu"

format:
  typst:
    papersize: us-letter
    margin:
      top: 0.5in
      bottom: 0.5in
      left: 0.6in
      right: 0.6in
    fontsize: 10pt
    mainfont: "Times New Roman"
  html:
    toc: false
    embed-resources: true
    format-links: false
    theme:
      - cosmo
      - infosci-one-pager.scss
---

```{=typst}
// UA Brand Colors
#let ua-blue = rgb("#0C234B")
#let ua-red = rgb("#AB0520")
#let ua-oasis = rgb("#378DBD")
#let ua-sky = rgb("#81D3EB")
#let ua-cool-gray = rgb("#E2E9EB")

// Heading styles for Typst
#show heading.where(level: 2): it => {
  v(0.12in)
  text(size: 12pt, weight: "bold", fill: ua-blue)[#it.body]
  v(0.05in)
}

#show heading.where(level: 3): it => {
  v(0.08in)
  text(size: 10pt, weight: "bold", fill: ua-blue)[#it.body]
  v(0.03in)
}

// Header banner
#rect(
  width: 100%,
  fill: ua-blue,
  inset: 12pt,
  radius: 4pt,
  [
    #grid(
      columns: (auto, 1fr),
      gutter: 12pt,
      [#image("assets/infosci-logo.png", width: 1.5in)],
      [
        #align(right)[
          #text(size: 18pt, fill: white, weight: "bold")[{{< meta title >}}]
          #v(4pt)
          #text(size: 11pt, fill: ua-sky)[{{< meta subtitle >}}]
        ]
      ]
    )
  ]
)

#v(0.12in)

// Metrics row (Typst version)
#grid(
  columns: (1fr, 1fr, 1fr),
  gutter: 8pt,
  ..for m in (
    ("500+", "Students Served"),
    ("94%", "Success Rate"),
    ("2020", "Year Established"),
  ) {
    (
      rect(
        width: 100%,
        fill: ua-cool-gray,
        inset: 8pt,
        radius: 4pt,
        align(center)[
          #text(size: 20pt, weight: "bold", fill: ua-red)[#m.at(0)]
          #v(2pt)
          #text(size: 9pt, fill: ua-blue)[#m.at(1)]
        ]
      ),
    )
  }
)

#v(0.1in)
```

::: {.metrics-row}
```{r}
#| echo: false
#| output: asis

metrics <- rmarkdown::metadata$metrics
if (!is.null(metrics)) {
  cat('<div class="metrics-container">\n')
  for (m in metrics) {
    cat(sprintf('<div class="metric"><span class="metric-value">%s</span><span class="metric-label">%s</span></div>\n',
                m$value, m$label))
  }
  cat('</div>\n')
}
```
